title: Highly improved aqueous Zn‖LiMn2O4 hybrid-ion batteries using poly(ethylene glycol) and manganese sulfate as electrolyte additives
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,826-836
DOI: 10.1039/D3SE01295F, Paper
Jingyi Kong, Hanling Guo, Yuan Li, Min Gong, Xiang Lin, Liang Zhang, Dongrui Wang
Using a low dosage of poly(ethylene glycol) and MnSO4 for co-filling a bisalt electrolyte efficiently enhances the charging/discharging cycling performance of aqueous Zn‖LiMn2O4 batteries at relatively low current densities.
